Posts.Content: Inflammatory breast cancer doesn't always form a tumor. Your symptoms are consistent with some of the symptoms of IBC, according to this article from the US National Cancer Institue.  https://www.cancer.gov/types/breast/ibc-fact-sheet I'd push for a referral to see an oncologist for a consult and testing. I just completed chemo and surgery for IBC. It is a very aggressive disease and every day counts when you are in need of diagnosis and treatment!
Posts.Title: Symptoms of IBC
